message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product. I would like to propose a price of $105.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still a bit above your target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $115.
